page.title: 18Legends & Customs
page.content: { The Beaumont Bogle}: a white horse is believed to haunt the bridge at the bottom of Beaumont Hill. Two people have reported{ghosts}in their homes. A Roman Legionary marches through a bungalow at Monkhill opening doors ; and at the old Rectory, when a bell was rung in the Kitchen the study door was opened. A{school treat}in the form of an outing and a Christmas party is organised by a committee every year. A{Palm Sunday procession}was held this year led by a donkey through Beaumont village to the Church. Each year a{Marsh Committee}meets at Sandsfield to arrange for the letting of the Marsh Stints (fields) and a dinner is held. Salmon is often served.
